critical_issues.issue: It is confusing whether this program is meant to be done independently, or within a team and with a mentor.  There are references to attending workshops with peers, assigning roles within your team, and weekly meetings with a mentor.  It appears the program is a collaborative effort and not an independent, asynchronous course.  Whichever format is planned, it needs to be clearly stated to set student expectations of whether they will be working with a team and mentor, or working independently.
critical_issues.details: Attachments are referenced that are not included in the course (e.g., assignment worksheets, student examples of completed assignments).

critical_issues.issue: Some of the referenced attachments/downloads are missing in the course (e.g., synthesis template, student examples).
